alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 4:56PM MST until January 08 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Buffalo Pass, Ganado and Window Rock. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 4 PM Today to 6 AM Monday: Buffalo Pass 5 to 9 inches Ganado 2 to 4 inches Window Rock 1 to 2 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
